t:
My son's school uses a secure fingerprint reader for checking the students in and out and
to track the guardians.

Then why does it say that I picked him up an hour ago
when I was still at work?
c:
The CCTV shows me picking him up. The CCTV at my work shows me too.



#son #school #pickup #fingerprint #secure #kidnap #doppelganger #trick
